content: **Awaken Wine Worms** are an item you can collect in Black Myth: Wukong that increases the healing effectiveness of your Gourd. Combat in Black Myth: Wukong can be quite the challenge, so picking up all of the Awaken Wine Worms to get the most out of your healing is essential.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations'.
The content is as follows:
**Awaken Wine Worms** are an item you can collect in Black Myth: Wukong that increases the healing effectiveness of your Gourd. Combat in Black Myth: Wukong can be quite the challenge, so picking up all of the Awaken Wine Worms to get the most out of your healing is essential.
